argumentSentences.text: The learned Counsel for the applicant has submitted that the applicants have no role to play in alleged offences, their names were disclosed by one of three accused apprehended on the spot, who are released by the Magistrate.
The applicants have no criminal antecedents and are businessman.

arguments.text: 4. On going through copy of FIR, it is evident that while the informant was on patrolling duty, he observed that a mob comprising of accused was armed with sword, sickle, etc. and was passing from Sayyednagar. On seeing police, -except three, rest accused fled away by leaving the weapons there on the spot. The informant got the names of the applicants disclosing from them. 5. In view of above, apprehension in the mind of applicant seems to be reasonable, warranting ad­interim protection, until hearing of exh.1. Hence, the order :

argumentSentences.text: On going through copy of FIR, it is evident that while the informant was on patrolling duty, he observed that a mob comprising of accused was armed with sword, sickle, etc. and was passing from Sayyednagar.
On seeing police, -except three, rest accused fled away by leaving the weapons there on the spot.
The informant got the names of the applicants disclosing from them.
In view of above, apprehension in the mind of applicant seems to be reasonable, warranting ad­interim protection, until hearing of exh.1.

order.text: ORDER 1) The application stands allowed as under :­ In the event of arrest, the applicants be released on furnishing P.R and S.B of Rs.15,000/­ each, on following conditions:­ a) They shall not tamper prosecution witnesses. b) They shall not leave India sans the permission of this Court. c) They shall attend the Police Station, as and when required by the Investigation Officer. 2) Issue show cause notice to respondents as to why said order should not be confirmed.

processedText:
Order below exh.4 in Cri. MA No.202/2019 CNR No. MHPU01­000735—2019 
---header-ends---
1. Perused the application and documentary evidence placed on record. Heard the learned Counsel for the applicant. 2. By this application, under Section 438 of Cr.P.C., the applicants / accused – Vinod aka Baiju Pillu Binawat and Satish Pillu Binawat, seek interim protection in Crime No. 20/2019, registered on 05.1.2019 with Wanwadi Police Station, Pune, under Sections 143, 144, 147, 148, 149, 506(2) of Indian Penal Code, under Section 3, 4/25 of the Arms Act, under Section 37(1)(3) of the Maharashtra Police Act and under Section 7 of Criminal Law Amendment Act. 
---background-ends---
3. The learned Counsel for the applicant has submitted that the applicants have no role to play in alleged offences, their names were disclosed by one of three accused apprehended on the spot, who are released by the Magistrate. The applicants have no criminal antecedents and are businessman.
---argument-ends---
4. On going through copy of FIR, it is evident that while the informant was on patrolling duty, he observed that a mob comprising of accused was armed with sword, sickle, etc. and was passing from Sayyednagar. On seeing police, -except three, rest accused fled away by leaving the weapons there on the spot. The informant got the names of the applicants disclosing from them. 5. In view of above, apprehension in the mind of applicant seems to be reasonable, warranting ad­interim protection, until hearing of exh.1. Hence, the order : 
---argument-ends---
ORDER 1) The application stands allowed as under :­ In the event of arrest, the applicants be released on furnishing P.R and S.B of Rs.15,000/­ each, on following conditions:­ a) They shall not tamper prosecution witnesses. b) They shall not leave India sans the permission of this Court. c) They shall attend the Police Station, as and when required by the Investigation Officer. 2) Issue show cause notice to respondents as to why said order should not be confirmed. 
---order-ends---
Notice r/o: 22.01.2019. Pune. (Vikas S. Kulkarni) January 11, 2019 Additional Sessions Judge, Pune. -3­ I affirm that the contents of this P.D.F.,file judgment are same word for word as per original Judgment. Name of Steno :­ Smt.
